Queries.Query:
select ID, -- Bar code of the goods in the batch BarCode,
-- Remains of the goods in the batch Ost, OstFirst, OstLast,
-- Name of drugs in this batch DrugsID->LastObj->FullName as DrugsFullName, DrugsID->LastObj->ShortName as DrugsShortName,
-- Information about drugs from drugs reference DrugsID->LastObj->EdIzm->LastObj->FullName as UnitFullName, -- SprEdi DrugsID->LastObj->EdIzm->LastObj->ShortName as UnitShortName, -- SprEdi
-- Фасовка DrugsID->LastObj->Fas, DrugsID->LastObj->MNN->LastObj->FullName as MNN, -- SprMNN DrugsID->LastObj->Producer->LastObj->FullName as ProducerFullName, -- SprProducer DrugsID->LastObj->Producer->LastObj->ShortName as ProducerShortName, -- SprProducer -- Кол-во в упаковке DrugsID->LastObj->Upak as Packaging, DrugsID->LastObj->TradeTech as TradeTech, -- SprTradeTech, DrugsID->LastObj->DrugsID->LastObj->FullName as DrugFullName, -- SprDrugsFull
-- Name of the supplier (contractor) DocDataID->Supplier->LastObj->FullName as SupplierFullName, -- Retail price DocDataID->CenaRozN as RetailPrice from PartiesGoods

select LastObj->UniqCode as ID, LastObj->ShortName as Name, LastObj->Parent->FullName as ParentName, "" as Atricul, "" as VidNomenklatura, LastObj->EdIzm->LastObj->FullName as UnitFullName, LastObj->FullName as FullName, "" as Comment, 0 as Service, "" as NomGroup, LastObj->DrugsID->LastObj->Country->FullName as Country, "" as GTD, "" as Cost, -- Статья затрат LastObj->DrugsID->LastObj->Specif, LastObj->Producer->LastObj->FullName as Producer, LastObj->DrugsID as Supplier, -- Импортер "" as TnVED, "" as OKVED, "" as OKP, LastObj->TypeNal->LastObj->FullName as NdsPerc, 0 as Fur, -- Меховое изделие "" as Period, "" as OperCode from SprDrugs where Destroyed = 0
